properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 4 at 9:44AM CST by NWS Paducah KY
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Paducah, Kentucky has issued a
flood warning for the following rivers in Kentucky...

Green River at Paradise

Heavy rainfall that has fallen and will continue to fall today across
the Green River basin. Paradise Kentucky will start to rise today and
will go above flood stage on Wednesday. It is forecast to crest at
385.3 feet on Saturday evening.

The National Weather Service in Paducah, Kentucky has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the Green River at Paradise.
* from Wednesday evening until further notice.
* At  9:15 AM Tuesday the stage was 376.4 feet.
* Flood Stage is 380.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by Wednesday evening and continue to
rise to near 385.3 feet by Saturday evening.
properties.instruction:
SAFETY MESSAGE...

Never drive cars...trucks or sport utility vehicles through flooded
areas. The water may be too deep to allow safe passage. Never allow
children to play in or near flood waters. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather
Radio or your local media for further statements and possible updated
forecasts.

Additional information is available at
http://www.crh.noaa.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=pah /lower case/
